Package library.service

Class LoanService

java.lang.Object
library.service.LoanService
public class LoanService extends Object
Service responsible for handling all borrowing operations in the library system.

This includes:

  • Borrowing books and assigning a 28-day due date.
  • Borrowing CDs and assigning a 7-day due date.
  • Checking overdue items (books and CDs).
  • Calculating fines for overdue materials.
  • Preventing borrowing when a user has overdue items or unpaid fines.
This class is central to Sprint 2, Sprint 4, and Sprint 5.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lojain

  • Constructor Details

    • LoanService

      public LoanService(LoanRepository repo)
      Constructs a LoanService using the system clock.
      Parameters:
      repo - Repository for storing loans.

    • LoanService

      public LoanService(LoanRepository repo, Clock clock)
      Constructs a LoanService with a custom clock (used for testing overdue logic).
      Parameters:
      repo - Repository for loan storage.
      clock - Clock instance used for date calculations.

  • Method Details

    • borrowBook

      public Loan borrowBook(User user, Book book)
      Borrows a book for a user with a fixed 28-day borrowing period.

      Borrowing restrictions:

      • User cannot have unpaid fines.
      • User cannot have any overdue books or CDs.
      • The book must not already be borrowed.
      Parameters:
      user - User borrowing the book.
      book - Book to be borrowed.
      Returns:
      A Loan instance containing borrow and due dates.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if borrowing rules are violated.

    • borrowCD

      public LoanCD borrowCD(User user, CD cd)
      Borrows a CD for a user with a fixed 7-day borrowing period.

      Borrowing restrictions:

      • User cannot have unpaid fines.
      • User cannot have any overdue materials.
      • The CD must not already be borrowed.
      Parameters:
      user - User borrowing the CD.
      cd - CD to be borrowed.
      Returns:
      A LoanCD instance containing borrow and due dates.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if borrowing rules are violated.

    • isOverdue

      public boolean isOverdue(Loan loan)
      Checks whether a book loan is overdue.
      Parameters:
      loan - The book loan to check.
      Returns:
      true if overdue, false otherwise.

      public boolean isOverdue(LoanCD loan)

      Returns:
      true if overdue, false otherwise.
